name: posteria
description: Posteria is a self-hosted web interface for managing and visualizing PostgreSQL databases. It provides insights, performance metrics, and SQL tools in a user-friendly UI.
features: Database visualization: View PostgreSQL database structure with interactive schema diagrams and relationships.
Performance metrics: Monitor query performance, connection statistics, and resource usage in real-time.
SQL editor: Execute queries with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and result formatting.
Query history: Access previously executed queries with timestamps and execution statistics.
Table browser: Browse table data with pagination, sorting, and filtering capabilities.
Index analysis: Identify missing indexes and optimization opportunities to improve query performance.
Connection management: Manage multiple PostgreSQL connections with saved credentials and quick switching.
Export functionality: Export query results and table data in CSV, JSON, and other formats.
User-friendly interface: Clean, modern UI designed for developers and database administrators.
Query insights: Analyze slow queries and get recommendations for performance improvements.
Database statistics: View database size, table counts, and storage usage metrics.
Role management: Visualize and manage database roles, permissions, and access controls.
